author: lgo
msg: * CHANGES: Add first set of changes to be included in 1.4.0.

author: lgo
msg: * CHANGES: fill in rev for 1.3.8, fix indentation.

author: lgo
msg: Attempt to fix issue #172: handle a server-triggered renegotiation correctly.
The issue fixed in this change is that serf stops sending OpenSSL's data needed
to handle the renegotiation, when pipeling is disabled and a request is already
(write_to_connection): Make sure serf keeps writing data for the SSL layer,
even if there is already a request outstanding and pipeling is disabled.
(request_or_data_pending): Only queue the next request when pipelining or
no request is pending yet. Initialize the output variable to NULL

author: ivan
msg: Pass SCHEME argument to all auth plugins callbacks.
(do_auth): Use provided SCHEME instead of AUTHN_INFO->SCHEME.
serf__validate_response_spnego_auth): Add SCHEME argument and pass
